cause.description:
Global Warming is neither global nor warming. The people who push the Global Warming hoax are just trying to gain power and money and are tearing apart the developed nations of the world with their slander and misinformation. Those who support lies for selfish gain should be opposed and not ignored.
1. Global Warming is not the cause of any human activity.
2. Those who spread fear with lies should not be tolerated.
3. Truth is inherently good, and everyone should know the truth.
cause.mission: Spread the Truth about Global Warming
cause.name: Global Warming is a Hoax
